participant_1.background:
I'll be inside cleaning and my dogs will be outside playing in the fresh air.
I don't own a car because I value my time and prefer to take public transportation or walk to restaurants.
i like lizards.
i drive a honda civic.
I'm a go-getter and always looking for ways to challenge myself.

i enjoy karaoke every friday night.

My parents are loving and supportive, even if they don't always understand my choices.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well! How about you?
I'm doing great, thanks! I'm excited for the weekend. What are you up to?
I'm going to be cleaning my house and spending time with my dogs. What are you doing?
I'm going to be hanging out with my friends and going to karaoke. Do you like to sing?
I love to sing! I go to karaoke every Friday night.
That's awesome! I'm not very good at it, but I have fun.
That's all that matters! I'm sure you're great.
Thanks! What kind of music do you like to sing?
I like to sing a variety of music, but my favorite is country music.
I love country music too! I'm a big fan of Luke Bryan.
Me too! He's one of my favorites.
I'm excited to see him in concert next month.
I'm jealous! I'm not sure if he's coming to my area anytime soon.
You should definitely go if he does! He puts on a great show.
I'll definitely try to go.
Good! You won't be disappointed.
Thanks for the recommendation!
You're welcome! Have a great weekend!
You too
